TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EntityPropertyMappingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class EntityPropertyMappingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class EntityPropertyMappingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定实体类型的属性与 WCF Data Services 返回的源中某项的元素之间自定义映射的特性。

span.span: Attribute that specifies a custom mapping between properties of an entity type and elements of an entry in a feed returned by WCF Data Services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于反射提供程序的数据模型中定义自定义源的映射。The is used to define custom feed mapping in the data model of a reflection provider. 此属性也适用于生成的客户端数据服务类时使用生成的类的元数据指示在数据模型中定义的自定义源的映射。This attribute is also applied to generated client data service classes when the metadata used to generate the classes indicates that custom feed mappings are defined in the data model. 此信息才可确保客户端可以创建和使用支持自定义源的消息。This information is necessary to make sure that the client can create and consume messages that support custom feeds. 有关详细信息，请参阅[馈送的自定义](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/feed-customization-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [Feed Customization](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/feed-customization-wcf-data-services.md). ## Examples 在下面的示例中，这两个属性的`Order`类型映射到现有的源元素。In the following example, both properties of the `Order` type are mapped to existing feed elements. `Product` 类型的 `Item` 属性映射到单独的命名空间中的自定义源特性。The `Product` property of the `Item` type is mapped to a custom feed attribute in a separate namespace. [!code-csharp[Astoria Custom Feeds#CustomIQueryableFeeds](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria custom feeds/cs/orderitems.svc.cs#customiqueryablefeeds)] [!code-vb[Astoria Custom Feeds#CustomIQueryableFeeds](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria custom feeds/vb/orderitems.svc.vb#customiqueryablefeeds)] 上面的示例为 URI `http://myservice/OrderItems.svc/Orders(0)?$expand=Items` 返回以下结果。The previous example returns the following result for the URI `http://myservice/OrderItems.svc/Orders(0)?$expand=Items`. [!code-xml[Astoria Custom Feeds#IQueryableFeedResultInline](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria custom feeds/xml/iqueryablefeedresultinline.xml#iqueryablefeedresultinline)]

param.name: sourcePath

span.span: The name of the property of the entity type, as string, that is mapped to the specified property in the feed.

param.span: 属性将映射到的结果源中的目标的名称（以字符串形式表示）。

span.span: The name of the target, as string, in the resulting feed to which the property is mapped.

param.name: targetNamespacePrefix
param.span: 此参数与 targetNamespaceUri 一起指定 targetPath 元素所在的命名空间。

span.span: This parameter, together with targetNamespaceUri, specifies the namespace in which the targetPath element exists.

param.name: targetNamespaceUri
param.span: 指定由 targetName 属性指定的元素的命名空间 URI（以字符串形式表示）。

span.span: Specifies the namespace URI of the element, as string, specified by the targetName property.

param.span: 布尔值，如果要映射的属性应同时出现在其映射到的位置和源的内容部分中，则为 。

span.span: Boolean value that is when the property being mapped should appear both in its mapped-to location and in the content section of the feed.

summary.span: 创建 的实例以将属性映射到自定义源元素。

span.span: Creates an instance of the to map a property to a custom feed element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果既没有`targetNamespacePrefix`也不`targetNamespaceUri`指定，`targetName`将默认命名空间中。If neither `targetNamespacePrefix` nor `targetNamespaceUri` are specified, the `targetName` will be put in the default namespace. 如果`targetNamespacePrefix`未指定，则自动生成的前缀。If `targetNamespacePrefix` is not specified, a prefix is autogenerated. 如果`targetNamespacePrefix`指定了，但`targetNamespaceUri`未指定，则在构造时引发异常。If `targetNamespacePrefix` is specified, but `targetNamespaceUri` is not specified, an exception is thrown at construction time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeepInContent As Boolean
public: property bool KeepInContent { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示是否应在源的内容部分和映射位置都出现同一属性值。

span.span: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether a property value should be repeated both in the content section of the feed and in the mapped location.

value.span: 一个 值，如果该属性映射到源中的这两个位置，则该值为 ；否则为 。

span.span: A value that is when the property is mapped into both locations in the feed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值为是`true`，源是与向后的兼容[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]使用协议版本 1.0 的客户端应用程序。Whenthe value of is `true`, the feed is backward compatible with [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] client applications that use protocol version 1.0. 时的值' 是`false`，数据服务所使用的协议版本必须是 2.0 或更高版本。When the value of ``is `false`, the protocol version used by the data service must be 2.0 or later versions. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据服务版本控制](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/data-service-versioning-wcf-data-services.md)。For more information, see [Data Service Versioning](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/data-service-versioning-wcf-data-services.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SourcePath As String
public: property System::String ^ SourcePath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取将映射到源的指定元素的联合项的属性名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the property of the syndication item that will be mapped to the specified element of the feed.

value.span: 包含属性名称的字符串值。

span.span: String value that contains property name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性无法直接引用复杂类型。The property cannot directly reference a complex type. 对于复杂类型，必须使用路径表达式，在此路径表达式中，使用反斜杠 (`/`) 字符分隔属性名称。For complex types, you must use a path expression where property names are separated by a backslash (`/`) character. 例如，针对某个实体类型允许以下值`Person`具有整数属性`Age`和复杂属性`Address`:For example, the following values are permitted for an entity type `Person` with an integer property `Age` and a complex property `Address`: - `Age` - `Address/Street` 不能将 属性设置为包含空格或在属性名称中无效的任何其他字符的值。The property cannot be set to a value that contains a space or any other character that is not valid in a property name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetNamespacePrefix As String
public: property System::String ^ TargetNamespacePrefix { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串值，该值与 一起指定 元素所在的命名空间。

span.span: Gets a string value that, together with , specifies the namespace in which the element exists.

value.span: 包含目标命名空间前缀的字符串值。

span.span: String value that contains the target namespace prefix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果既没有也不指定，将默认命名空间中。If neither nor are specified, the will be put in the default namespace. 如果未指定，则自动生成的前缀。If is not specified, a prefix is autogenerated. 如果指定了，但未指定，则在构造时引发异常。If is specified, but is not specified, an exception is thrown at construction time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetNamespaceUri As String
public: property System::String ^ TargetNamespaceUri { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串值，该值指定由 属性指定的元素的命名空间 URI。

span.span: Gets a string value that specifies the namespace URI of the element specified by the property.

value.span: 包含命名空间 URI 的字符串。

span.span: String that contains the namespace URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果映射到非联合元素/属性，此属性为目标元素/属性的命名空间。If mapping to non-syndication element/attribute, this property is the namespace for the target element/attribute. 如果既没有也不指定，将默认命名空间中。If neither nor are specified, the will be put in the default namespace. 如果未指定，则自动生成的前缀。If is not specified, a prefix is autogenerated. 如果指定了，但未指定，则在构造时引发异常。If is specified, but is not specified, an exception is thrown at construction time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetPath As String
public: property System::String ^ TargetPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取属性将映射到的源中的自定义目标的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the custom target in the feed to which the property is mapped.

value.span: 带有目标 XML 元素或特性的字符串值。

span.span: String value with target XML element or attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置属性，则和还必须设置属性。When the property is set, the and properties must also be set. 值必须是`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 时的值属性不是。The value of must be `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) when the value of the property is anything other than . 必须是一个反斜杠分隔嵌套的元素的路径表达式 (`/`) 和与符号指定特性 (`@`)。 must be a path expression in which nested elements are separated by a backslash (`/`) and attributes are specified by an ampersand (`@`). 在以下示例中，字符串 `UnitsInStock/@ReorderLevel` 将属性值映射到根项元素的 `ReorderLevel` 子元素上的 `UnitsInStock` 特性。In the following example, the string `UnitsInStock/@ReorderLevel` maps a property value to an attribute named `ReorderLevel` on a child element named `UnitsInStock` of the root entry element. [!code-xml[Astoria Custom Feeds#EdmFeedMappedToAttributeSpecific](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria custom feeds/xml/northwind.csdl#edmfeedmappedtoattributespecific)] 属性不能包含空格。The property cannot contain white space. 属性不表示为 true 的 XPath 表达式，但指定的元素和属性名称必须表示格式正确的 XML 元素和属性。The property is not expressed as a true XPath expression, but the specified element and attribute names must represent well-formed XML elements and attributes. 无效的值将导致异常发生时初始化数据服务。An invalid value will cause an exception to occur when the data service is initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetSyndicationItem As SyndicationItemProperty

span.span: Gets a property on the class.
A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果映射到联合元素，此属性将为联合项的名称。If mapping to syndication element, this property is the name of the syndication item. 此值必须设置为`None`如果不为 null。This value must be set to `None` if the is not null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetTextContentKind As SyndicationTextContentKind

summary.span: 获取由 映射的属性的内容类型。

span.span: Gets the type of content of the property mapped by .

value.span: 一个标识源元素中的内容类型的字符串。

span.span: A string that identifies the type of content in the feed element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果映射到联合内容，此属性将为联合项的内容类型。If mapping to syndication content, this property is the content type of syndication item. 为 特性指定值 时，必须确保该属性值包含格式正确的 XML。When you specify a value of for the attribute, you must ensure that the property value contains properly formatted XML. 数据服务返回值，但不执行任何转换。The data service returns the value without performing any transformations. 还必须确保返回的 XML 中任何 XML 元素前缀在映射的源中定义了命名空间 URI 和前缀。You must also ensure that any XML element prefixes in the returned XML have a namespace URI and prefix defined in the mapped feed.
